Class DistChannelHandler

  • java.lang.Object

extends BaseHandler
    DistChannelHandler - provides methods to access distribution channel information.

               java.lang.String release,

        Sets, overrides (/removes if channelLabel empty) a distribution channel map within an organization
        Parameters:
        loggedInUser - The current user
        os - OS
        release - Relase
        archName - architecture label
        channelLabel - channel label
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if successful, exception otherwise
